DOC.brief_summary: Chart Review of patients with pancreatic cancer treated with combination of irinotecan, oxaliplatin and cetuximab.
DOC.brief_title: INST 0603C Patients With Unresectable/Metastatic Pancreatic Cancer Treated in the UNM Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Chart Review to describe the clinical outcomes in patients pancreatic cancer treated with combination of irinotecan, oxaliplatin and cetuximab.
DOC.criteria: Patients with unresectable/metastatic pancreatic cancer treated in the UNM Cancer Research and Treatment Center. Not specified.
